title: CBB's Coleen Nolan breaks down as she recalls Shane Richie affair and claims her husband doesn't 'fancy' her
text:
TV CBB's Coleen Nolan breaks down as she recalls Shane Richie affair and claims her husband doesn't 'fancy' her The Loose Women star shows she has lost her confidence as she opens up about the blows she has faced Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Coleen Nolan breaks down in tears about troublesome marriage Share this video Get celebs   
She's back in the Celebrity Big Brother house, but before re-entering the house, Coleen Nolan showed how she lost her spark and confidence as she opened up about her rocky marriage and how she hit rock bottom when she found out her ex Shane Richie had been cheating on her. 
The Loose Women star broke down in tears as she discussed a number of personal issues that have impacted on her life, from discovering Shane Richie's affair during their seven-year marriage, to how she feels that her current husband Ray Fensome doesn't fancy her. 
Coleen couldn't hold back the tears as she admitted that she's desperate to save her marriage. Coleen Nolan breaks down on In Therapy (Photo: Channel 5) She confessed she 'hated' crying but couldn't hold back the tears (Photo: Channel 5) 
“I don’t want it to fail again,” Coleen said during the emotional episode of In Therapy. 
“I really love him but I always feel like I’m having a go at him… That’s horrible.” Coleen opened up about a number of issues she's faced over the years (Photo: Channel 5) Coleen Nolan and Ray Fensome (Photo: The Vain Photography) 
Coleen admitted that she struggles to face conflict because she “can't be bothered” and will often leave but she refuses to stay with a man who isn't happy with her. 
“I can’t bare the thought of someone staying with me if they’re not happy – [if he leaves] I’ll get over it,” she said. 
“I’ve never really felt good enough for someone… I know Ray doesn’t fancy me… Oh my God I’m crying, I hate crying.” Coleen Nolan enters the Celebrity Big Brother House at Elstree Studios (Photo: WireImage) Coleen Nolan enters the Celebrity Big Brother House at Elstree Studios (Photo: WireImage) 
The episode, which aired on Channel 5, also saw the star discuss her marriage to Shane Richie. 
The couple were married between 1990 and 1997, and she discovered that her then-husband had been unfaithful and having an affair. 
“He was so brilliant at convincing me I was wrong. He would look me right in the eyes… and convince me I was wrong. He made me feel paranoid,” she said. Shane Richie with Coleen Nolan and sons Jake and Shane (Photo: Scope Features) Shane Richie and Coleen Nolan on their wedding day in 1990 (Photo: Rex) 
“I remember that feeling of elation when I found out [he was having an affair].. I went ‘Yes! I knew it…’ 
“It was a feeling of euphoria before the absolute devastation hit me – he still convinced me to stay.” 
Coleen also talked about losing her sister Bernie to cancer and her abusive father. 
She re-entered the Celebrity Big Brother house on Tuesday without her wedding ring, and recently revealed that she was treating it as a “trial separation” from her husband. 
"We're going to do a lot of talking over the next couple of weeks, but if we can't fix it then I want us to have counselling. The next step is a trial separation," she told The Mirror. Like us on Facebook
